title: Unlawful Passage
description:
Even heroes need a vacation. 


Unfortunately, Hannah and her friends chose the wrong beach.

The Oracle needs help. She’s dying, and only Ezekiel knows that the world will die along with her. Hannah and her team take up the call without hesitation.

The only problem? It takes a freaking long time to cross the world.


While putting their quest on hold for a much needed rest stop and resupply, Karl, Hadley and Laurel get captured by some angry locals, who accuse them of kidnapping their leader’s son.Hannah and Parker head to the rescue, leaving Gregory alone to guard the airship on a remnant infested hilltop.
What could possibly go wrong?


Unlawful Passage explores the magical land of Irth beyond the Arcadian Valley. It’s a fast and fun romp guaranteed to keep you laughing and pumping your fist all the way to the end.
author: C.M. Raymond
